fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose to send an Air Marshal to someone's house up to 3 times per game.
- The Air Marshal will rampage, attacking all players there. If you kill no one, your charge is refunded.
- The Air Marshal is considered an astral visit, and you won't trigger things like the Veteran.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You go missing in 3 nights, dying.
- Each kill you get delays the time until you go missing by a night.
- If you're roleblocked you kill your roleblocker and clean them.
